Sentencas: Globally, the issue of climate change due to greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions is now broadly acknowledged as one of the major challenges facing humankind that requires urgent attention.
Titulo: Comparative environmental profile assessments of commercial and novel material structures for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Accordingly, considerable efforts on clean energy technologies and policy recommendations have been developed to address this challenge.
Titulo: Comparative environmental profile assessments of commercial and novel material structures for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have been touted to play a role in achieving a reduction in global GHG emissions, offering numerous advantages including higher efficiencies and reduced emissions, over other conventional methods of energy generation.
Titulo: Comparative environmental profile assessments of commercial and novel material structures for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The increasing recognition and emphasis on fuel cells as a representative power generation system of the future has raised concerns over their environmental profile.
Titulo: Comparative environmental profile assessments of commercial and novel material structures for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Extensive research regarding the environmental profile of current structures of SOFCs can be found In the literature, but none consider the use of new materials to achieve lower environmental impacts.
Titulo: Comparative environmental profile assessments of commercial and novel material structures for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This research fills the gap and presents a comparison of the environmental profile of three SOFC structures: a commercially available structure, and two intermediate temperature structures, one using erbia-stabilised bismuth oxide electrolytes and a proposed structure using strontium-doped sodium bismuth titanate electrolytes.
Titulo: Comparative environmental profile assessments of commercial and novel material structures for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Using a functional unit of kg/100 kW of power output for each of the SOFC structures (excluding the interconnects), within a hybrid life cycle analysis framework, the environmental hotspots across the supply chains of each SOFC type are identified, quantified and ranked.
Titulo: Comparative environmental profile assessments of commercial and novel material structures for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show the use of these novel material combinations leads to a reduction in embodied materials and toxicological impact but higher electrical energy consumption during fabrication, in comparison to commercial SOFCs.
Titulo: Comparative environmental profile assessments of commercial and novel material structures for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The findings support the move to reduce the operating temperatures of SOFCs using these novel material architectures, which leads to an overall reduction in environmental impact due to the lower operational energy requirement of the chosen material constituents.
Titulo: Comparative environmental profile assessments of commercial and novel material structures for solid oxide fuel cells
